name: messy
description:
for spscreativeprocess

look around with mouse, move around with WASD

  • first file is the a mac build (can only be run on mac, i couldn't get it to build to windows)
  • second file is the soundtrack which is me making a complete auditory mess with horrifying  a u g m en t e d  ch o rd s

  • lighthouse is by me, other assets/textures were borrowed from Epic (:
    • also it says magic circle in the filename just because I used the same base project for my magic circle project
